name.en: I'm Having Trouble with My Fields Being Destroyed!
name.ja: <ruby>畑<rt>はたけ</rt></ruby>が<ruby>荒<rt>あ</rt></ruby>らされて<ruby>困<rt>こま</rt></ruby>ってます！

effect.en: Ritual Summon "Sparkhearts Passion Girl" or "Sparkhearts Passion Makma" by sending face-up FIRE Attribute Spellcaster Type monsters from your field to the Graveyard as material whose total Levels equal or exceed the Level of the monster you Ritual Summon (you cannot use more monsters than necessary as material). Then, you can destroy 1 face-up Level 6 or lower Beast or Winged Beast Type monster on your opponent's field.
